meanings: at a[one] stretch[stroke], at a breath, by one effort, without a break, at a heat, at a draft[gulp](마시다)
drink down[up] in a single draft[gulp]
empty[swallow] the glass at a gulp
dash in a breath[with one breath]

vlive.korean: [단숨에 술자리(?) 완소템 등극] 그때 애들이 다 이거 뺏어 발랐어요. When we were drinking, my friends all took this and put it on. 듣기 View video 컨버전스 TV (CONS TV) : [예쁨전공] 백석대학교 VS 강릉원주대학교 3-4회
vlive.english: When we were drinking, my friends all took this and put it on.

vlive.korean: [봉재현/단숨에 오르는 스승님을 보고 당황] 에! 여... 여기서부터 시작하면 되는 건가요? [Bong Jae Hyun / Perplexed after watching him] OK. Should I start here? 듣기 View video Golden Child : 골든차일드(Golden Child) ‘골차의 휴일 2’ #2

examples.korean: at a[one] breath 발음듣기 단숨에. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
He recited the whole poem in one breath. 발음듣기 그는 그 시를 단숨에 다 읊었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He recited the whole poem in one breath. 발음

examples.korean: In one gulp, he drained the glass. 발음듣기 그는 단숨에 그 잔을 비웠다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: In one gulp, he drained the glass. 발음

examples.korean: I read the book at one go. 발음듣기 나는 그 책을 단숨에 읽었다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I read the book at one go. 발음

examples.korean: He downed the medicine at one swallow. 발음듣기 그는 그 약을 단숨에 들이마셨다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He downed the medicine at one swallow. 발음
